turns.content:
Create a table with columns based on the following key elements: Photo Style, Composition, Camera Angle, Room Type, Focal Point, Textures, Clothing, Color Palette, Camera Model, Lighting, Location, Time of Day, Mood, Architecture, Aspect Ratio

Give me rows Mood = Glamorous, Opulent as comma-separated sentences

Here are two rows with Mood = Glamorous and Opulent:

1. Photo Style: Symmetrical, Composition: Centered, Camera Angle: Low Angle, Room Type: Ballroom, Focal Point: Woman in Glittering Gown, Textures: Luxurious, Clothing: Formal, Color Palette: Gold and Black, Camera Model: Canon EOS R5, Lighting: Artificial, Location: Palace, Time of Day: Nighttime, Mood: Glamorous, Architecture: Baroque, Aspect Ratio: 4:3.
2.
